answers.answer: No its not normal call your Dr.  It can me preclamsia .. better to get checked
Is your tongue swollen or having trouble breathing? Sounds like a sign of allergic reaction. It could also be preeclampsia. Go to your doc right away.

question: OMG has anyone woken up with swollen lips during their pregnancy? My face is swollen but so are my lips..I have 21 more days to go is this normal? My legs are starting to get heavier and I feel so worn out! I love my baby girl and can't wait to hold her but I'm so over being pregnant !!
title: Swollen?
